snippet: The Russian leader lamented rising global “fractures,” even in affluent countries, but made no mention of the Kremlin’s efforts to stir up disorder....

byline.contributor: Sophia Kishkovsky and Oleg Matsnev contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The Russian leader lamented rising global “fractures,” even in affluent countries, but made no mention of the Kremlin’s efforts to stir up disorder.

headline.main: A Subdued Vladimir Putin Calls for ‘Mutually Beneficial’ Ties With U.S.
headline.print_headline: In Measured Speech, Putin Calls for ‘Mutually Beneficial’ Ties With U.S.
